titleStmt.title: SII 8.213: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 213. (A.R. No. 616 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . śrīkomāṟupaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ Emmaṇṭalamuṅkoṇṭaruḷiya śrīsandarapāṇḍyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 4vatu Itaṉ Etir munṟāvatu kaṟkaṭaka
nāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu saptamiyum tiṅkaḷk=kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa coti nāḷ muttūṟṟukkūṟṟattuk kiḻkūṟṟut tevatāṉan tiruppuṉavāyiluṭaiya nāya
ṉār koyil sthāṉattom nilavilaipramāṇa Icaivutiṭṭuc coḻamaṇṭalattu virutarājabhayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭut toṇṭanāṭṭuk koṉnā
ṭṭu Ilaikkaṭampūruṭaiyāṉāna kampanāyaṉ Antippiṟaiyaṉ tiruñāṉacampantaṟku nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta maṉaikaḷum nilaṅkaḷumāvaṉa Ivvū
r vaṭikkoṉtiruvitiyiṟ teṟkkutiruvitiyiṟ teṉciṟakil viṟṟukkuṭutta maṉaikaḷ Añcukku Ellaiyāvatu . teṉpāṟkellai Ūrcūḻntu kiṭaṅkukku vaṭakku mel
pāṟkellai Immaṉaikaḷ Añcukkum mel nantavāṉattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Ittiruvitikkut teṟku kiḻpāṟkellai tirumatiṭkkūṭṭa maṅkalātairāyaṟku Iṭṭa maṉaikku me
cainta perunāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa maṉaikaḷ Añciṉāl kol patiṉaiṅkolum Ittāl vanta vālniḷamum Ivarkku viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Ivvūrp peru
ṅkuḷam nāṟpatteṇṇāyirappereriyilt tiruñāṉacampantaṉeṉṉum maṭaiyāl nirpāyun nilamāy mutunilattaricāṉa nilattuk kaḷarppāḻāy Ivvūrk kicain
ta vaḷavaṉpakkal vilaikoṇṭa nilattil Ivarkku viṟṟukkuṭutta nilam muppatumāvukku Ellaiyāvatu . teṉpārkkellai vaḷavaṉ pallavaraiyaṉ Iūravarpakkal vilai
koṇṭu tirunantāviḷakkuppuṟamāka viṭṭa nilattukkum Ivvūravar kollaṉukkum taṭṭāṉukkum Iṭṭa nilattil vaṭavarampukku vaṭakkum melpārkkellai Ivvūravar Icaintu Iṟaikkik kaṭ
ṭiṉa karaikku kaḻivu kol viṭṭuk kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai Innila maḷanta kol muppatumāvukkut teṟkum kiḻpāṟkellai kuḷakkarai tuṭaṅki Iṉṉilam muppatumāvukkuk kol
viḻunta karaiykku meṟkum Āka Icainta perunāṉkellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa nilam muppatumāvum Immaṉai Añcum viṟṟukkuṭutton tiruñāṉacampantatevaṟku sthānattom . nilam muppatu mā
vum Immaṉai Añcum viṟṟukkuṭuttukkoḷvatāṉa Emmi licainta vilaipporuḷ Āvaṇakkaḷariye kāṭṭeṟṟi kaiccelavaṟak kaikkoṇṭa pañcacalākai Accup patiṉeḻarai
kkum vilaiyāvatākavum . Ippaṭi saṁvadittu viṟṟu vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta nilaṅkaḷilum maṉaikaḷilum meṉokkiṉa maraṅkaḷum kiḻṉokkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷum kuḷamum kuḷavāytta
laiyum Itilkkuṟai Itil meltalaiyile veṭṭittu .
miṉpaṭu paḷḷamum teṉpaṭu potumpum cuṭukāṭum paṭutuṟaiyum Uṭumpoṭiyum Āmai
tavaḻiyum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa Urimaikaḷum bhāgamum bhāgāśrayaṅkaḷum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭaṉavum A
kappaṭa vilaikkuṟa viṟṟup poruḷaṟak kaikkoṇṭu viṟṟu vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta nilattukkum maṉai
kkum Ituve poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭcelavolai yāvatākavum Ituvallatu poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭ
celavolai kāṇavum kāṭṭavum kaṭavatallavākavum Innilam veṭṭat tirutta Ākkat tām veṇṭiya
tellām kamukum koṭiyuḷḷiṭṭa payiṟ ceytum ceyvittuṅ koḷḷappeṟuvarākavum Innilam va
rampil ceṉṟatu nilattu certalāl kaṭamai kuṭimai kaṟpūravari Antarāyam viṉiyokam poṉvari
maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭaṉavum Iṟaiyiliyāka Āḷappeṟuvarākavum Innilaṅkaḷum maṉaikaḷum
Ivaṟku dānādhamaṉakrayavikrayaṅkaḷukku ssoMmāvatākavum Ippaṭi cendrādittavaṟ cellakkaṭavatākavum Ippa
ṭi saṁvadittu Olaikkuṟṟam Eḻuttukkuṟṟam coṟkuṟṟam Ekkuṟṟamum kuṟṟa mallavāvutākavum Immaṉai Aiñ
cum Iṉṉilam muppatumāvum Orukālāvatum Irukālāvatum mukkālāvatum viṟṟu vilaipra māṇam
paṇṇikkuṭuttom Ivvilaikkaṭampūruṭaiyāṉāna kampaṉāyaṉ tiruñāṉacampantaṟku Ittiruppuṉa
vāyal sthāṉattom . Iṉṉāyaṉār tirunāḷ Añcukkum yāgamaṇḍapattile Addhyayaṉampaṇṇa
Ivvūr Aṇiyātittaccaturvvedimaṅkalam Eṉṟu Ittiruppuṉavāyalil vaitta vakaram vaikkaiyāl I
vvakaratti lirunta brāhmaṇar Addhyayaṉam paṇṇak=kaṭavatākavum Innilaṅkaḷum maṉaikaḷum I
vaṟkuk kuṭuttapaṭi sommāvutākavum Ippaṭi saṁvadittom . Ippaṭikku Ivai śaivaśikhāma
ṇi brahmātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tarumakuḻakarkūṭṭa Āhārān=tarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai
pārayartevar Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai civabhāgyadevar Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai ceramāṉtoḻaṉ E
ḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai śrīkāriyañceyvār vicaiyarāyar Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tirutto
ṇṭabhaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai Aṇiyātittabhaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai narasiṁhapaṇḍitar
Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai dakṣaṇāmūrttibhaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai pārvatitevapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu .
Ippaṭikku Ivai Aḻakiyapāṇṭiya brahmātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Amutaṉ ceramāṉāṉa kattiyaraiyaṉ Eḻu
ttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ nāyaṉ Aṭaiviyāṉa cempiyaṉ coḻamārāyar taṟkuṟimāṭṭeṟintamaikkum perumāḷ naṭukka
ntavirttāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ pāñcālarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ coṟuṭaiccoḻa viḻupparaiyar
Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Uṭaiyārnāyaṉāṉa pattarpāṭṭukantāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Aḻakiyaco
ḻamārāyar taṟkuṟimāṭṭu Eṟintu nāṉu maṟiveṉ poṉṉappiḷḷaiyāṉa I
Iraṭṭai paḷḷikoṇṭāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ muṉaiyataraiyar taṟkuṟimāṭ
ṭeṟintu nāṉu maṟiveṉ cikāḻippiḷḷaiyāṉa mātavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 8.213 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
